overview:
Jason Bigler is responsible for the overall strategic direction of the Collective product suite. An industry veteran, Jason brings over 15 years of product management experience in developing consumer and enterprise software solutions.

Prior to joining Collective, Jason was Vice President of Product Management at Conductor, where he was responsible for the overall product strategy of Conductorâ€™s SEO technology platform. Prior to that, Jason was Vice President of Product Management at DoubleClick, where he was responsible for the global product strategy of DoubleClick’s digital advertising product suite. During his tenure he oversaw over $40 million of revenue growth and significant market share gains over key competitors. In 2006 his innovative work was recognized by the industry with an ASPY award for best technology solution. Jason has also held several product management positions within emerging firms in the messaging and financial services industries.

Jason earned his MBA from Duke Universityâ€™s Fuqua School of Business, and a B.A. from West Virginia University.
